Plot: Everyone knows Pandora Radio, it is designed to play what you want, when you want it. Pandora puts an endless assortment of music at your fingertips, but with great power comes great responsibility.
Title: Pandora's Box
Writer: Steven Della Salla, Michael Leavy, Kyle Mullins
Actors: Steven Della Salla, Megen Hensch, Andrew Johansen, Isabelle Krysiak
